comments.creator: ultrapower@up-hosting.de
comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0

When I'm opening a link in a new tab it doesn't load (there is only a new tab and the link in the adress bar but it doesn't load automaticaly). This bug is since the RC.

Reproducible: Sometimes



Expected Results:  
The software should load new tabs automaticly.
comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0

comments.author: ultrapower@up-hosting.de
srikrishnakmr111@gmail.com
comments.text:
This works fine in Mozilla 4.0 version in windows 7 and also it works properly in all the versions.....also i tried in windows 8.

In windows 7 x86 (32 bit) it is displaying links automatically in new tab whenever we are trying to open links on new tab..... may be due to environmental issue this may not work for sometime
comments.creator: srikrishnakmr111@gmail.com
